snippet: Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Chase has received advice from Lloyd C. Blankfein of Goldman Sachs. | Activist investing has traditionally been greeted with hostility in Japan. | Daniel S. Loeb is taking a polite approach with Sony. | Bloomberg L.P. is...
abstract: Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Chase has received advice from Lloyd C. Blankfein of Goldman Sachs. | Activist investing has traditionally been greeted with hostility in Japan. | Daniel S. Loeb is taking a polite approach with Sony. | Bloomberg L.P. is growing to resemble the Wall Street firms that are its clients.
